column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The Eulmoran soldier requires some assistance in his endeavor to raise the spirits of his city's people.
Take notes on Eulmorans' food preferences.
Report to the Eulmoran soldier at the Eulmoran Army Headquarters.
Haven't we met somewh─ Oh, it's you! I saw you fight! You were so strong, so confident, but so careful not to injure any of the civilians...

Maybe you'd be interested in helping out with what I'm planning. I'm a fairly decent cook, actually─I sometimes feel as if that's the <Emphasis>only</Emphasis> thing I'm good at─and I thought it might bring people comfort to know that they could come here and get a decent meal.

The trouble is, there are too many options as to what I could prepare, and I'm not much for making decisions. I would simply ask around, but civilians tend to get a bit nervous when a member of the army starts asking questions, and I don't want to cause anyone <Emphasis>more</Emphasis> distress.
That being the case─would you mind asking a few people what sort of dishes might lift their spirits? I don't need the recipes, just ideas.
Food that would lift my spirits? Hmm... Voeburt muffins, maybe? My mother often used to make them.

Free meals? Yes, that would certainly improve the mood around here. As for what people would enjoy─perhaps a dish that they've never had before? Though I'm not terribly familiar with anything other than Voeburtite cuisine, myself.

How about Kholusian stew? It was a popular dish before the Flood, apparently. All I really know is that it's meant to incorporate a variety of seafood, but I've always wanted to try it─seems a shame that I've never had the traditional food of my homeland.
The smell of baking muffins is absolutely divine, I assure you!
Perhaps someone who wasn't born locally might have more ideas...
I don't know about you, but reviving the popularity of Kholusian stew and reclaiming our heritage would certainly raise <Emphasis>my</Emphasis> spirits!
Welcome back! Were people able to suggest anything for me to cook?
Oh, you wrote them down! Thank you! Let me see...
Ah, Voeburt muffins and Kholusian stew! I've made those for my patrons before. I'll need fresh seafood from Stilltide, but that shouldn't be an issue.
As for a dish that people in Eulmore haven't had before─what do you think? Have you come upon anything in your travels outside the city that people might enjoy?
What will you say?
Nothing is so comforting as one of the Mol's buuz on a chill evening.
Perhaps a relaxing cup of herbal tea to pair with the meal?
Basilisk stew has been known to increase morale.
Dough with seafood <Emphasis>inside</Emphasis> of it? That does sound intriguing. Salty shellfish and tender stewed catfish, together in a hearty bun... Yes, I can picture it.
Yes, that does sound pleasant. We can't focus solely on the food, after all. I haven't the slightest idea what an “Ishgard” is, but I'd certainly be willing to try brewing tea with lily bulbs.
A sergeant who offered homemade stew to his troops, warming their hearts and lifting their spirits? Oh, I love a dish with a story to tell!
I'll prepare each of these with the care they deserve, and hopefully my fellow Eulmorans will find some solace in sharing a warm meal.
I'm off to fetch ingredients, but before I go─here's a little something that I prepared for you, as thanks. I hope it suits your tastes!
